title: Adhya Diamond and Emerald Grand Haaram - సమకాలీన శోభ
materials: Crafted in 18K Yellow Gold (పసుపు బంగారం) and embellished with brilliant-cut Diamonds (వజ్రాలు) of VS clarity and G-H color. Features exquisite Emeralds (పచ్చలు) of Zambian origin. Finished with a luxurious Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This breathtaking haaram seamlessly blends modern aesthetics with traditional South Indian sensibilities. The floral motifs are meticulously arranged and pave-set with diamonds, creating a dazzling display of light. Emeralds are bezel set adding a pop of color, Modern mesh chain adding the comfortability.
colors: The color palette is a classic combination of vibrant Gold
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (వివాహం)
and milestone celebrations. A statement piece ideal for muhurtham ceremonies
or any occasion where you want to exude timeless elegance.
description: This haaram offers unparalleled brilliance and craftsmanship. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds, combined with the durable gold setting, ensure this piece will be cherished for generations. A testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry tradition, enhanced with contemporary designs.
